Liam Hemsworth has been snapped for the first time with his new girlfriend Maddison Brown in New York City.

The Australian actor, 29, was spotted enjoying a low-key date alongside the 22-year-old blonde on Thursday.

The star and Maddison put on a cosy display as they emerged from the underground station to take a stroll hand-in-hand before sitting down for a bite to eat at Italian restaurant Sant Ambroeus.

As the couple dined al-fresco they chatted whilst sipping on cocktails.

Hunky Liam appeared happy and relaxed as he strolled along in dark trousers and a tight T-shirt before wrapping up in a jacket and shading his eyes with sunglasses.

(Image: TMZ / BACKGRID)

Maddison rocked an off-duty look in distressed skinny jeans teamed with a patterned shirt and black overcoat.

Australian actress Maddison is best known for her role as Kirby Anders in Dynasty.

The beauty has also starred in Strangerland with Nicole Kidman and Australian TV series The Kettering Incident in 2016.

It comes after Liam and former flame Miley Cyrus announced their split in August after less than a year of marriage.

(Image: TMZ / BACKGRID)

(Image: JosiahW / BACKGRID)

While he appears to be moving on, Miley is already on her second fling since they called it quits.

Just days after the announcement she was spotted kissing Kaitlynn Carter on a yacht while on holiday in Italy.

They dated for a few weeks before Miley ended things, reportedly not wanting anything serious.

(Image: PA)

Since that coupling fell apart, Miley has been seen kissing Cody Simpson, in what has been a rollercoaster few months for the former Disney Channel star.

The pair have been dating for a few weeks with Miley even referring to him as her 'boyfriend.'

Miley seems smitten with the new man in her life as she admitted she felt the 'luckiest' to have him by her side as she recovered from a throat infection.

The singer spoke out about their 'make out sessions' last week and said Cody was just 'her type.'
description: Miley Cyrus' ex has been pictured with his new sweetheart for the first time as they took the subway and then enjoyed a meal together
